table.name: vtiger_exactonline
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_exactonline` ( `exactonlineid` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `exactrecordno` VARCHAR(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `exactrecordname` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL , `exactonlinereturn` VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`exactonlineid`)) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_exactonlinecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_exactonlinecf` ( `exactonlineid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`exactonlineid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_exactonline_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_exactonline_settings` ( `exactonlineid` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `exactauthurl` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'https://start.exactonline.nl/api/oauth2/auth' , `exacttokenurl` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'https://start.exactonline.nl/api/oauth2/token' , `exactapiurl` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'https://start.exactonline.nl/api/v1/' , `exactclientid` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `exactsecret` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `exactreturnurl` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `access_token` VARCHAR(1000) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `refresh_token` VARCHAR(1000) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `exactrefreshedtime` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , `exactdivision` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `glaccounts_start` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `glaccounts_stop` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`exactonlineid`)) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
